text: Approval for expanding the indications to include use with silicone/acrylate and fluorosilicone/acrylate rigid gas permeable (rgp) contact lenses.  When used with rgp lenses, the device will be marketed under the trade name, contaclair(r) rgp multi-purpose solution, and is indicated for use in cleaning, rinsing, disinfecting and storing daily and extended wear rgp contact lenses.
